pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cross-Recurrence Quantification Analysis for Dynamic Natural Language Processing // Cross-recurrence quantification analysis for word series, from text, known as categorical recurrence analysis. Uses the 'crqa' R package by Coco and Dale (2014) doi:10.3389/fpsyg.2014.00510. Functions are wrappers to facilitate exploration of the sequential properties of text.
